long_description: When your furry pal has to balance in the backseat, the Kurgo Loft Hammock Seat Cover has you covered. It serves double duty, keeping your pup safely off the floor and dirt off your seats. Designed to be used in vehicles with bench seats, not for bucket seats or stand-alone use. 5 attachment points keep hammock in place. Can be used as a hammock, or you can remove the front attachments to create a seat cover. Ripstop polyester fabric is waterproof and machine washable. Reversible (blue reverses to orange, green to gray). Kurgo Loft Hammock Seat Cover fits most automobiles, sedans, station wagons, SUVs & minivans.
